Title: Prohibits state contracts with contractors who do not provide health insurance which covers services for transgender, non-binary, and gender expansive people
Summary: Prohibits state contracts with contractors who do not provide health insurance which covers services for transgender, non-binary, and gender expansive people.
LawCode: Add ยง139-m, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to participation in state contracts
